channel.title: How to add command ::yell

item.title: How to add command ::yell
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

There is a tutorial in the client hacking section about how to add color to yell, go take a look.

(P.S. You should use an array for your yell command).

Read full topic

item.title: How to add command ::yell
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Look at this line of your “yell” command

titles = "[@whi@Moderator]@bla@ ";

It has to look like this.

titles = "@whi@[Moderator] - @bla@";

Read full topic

@Keatrm wrote:

That is becuase the base you use doesnt support the @color@ codes, Exion does work like that, I would recommend that base

item.title: How to add command ::yell
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

Hello i try to add a yell command command for my server but when i yell the colors dont work

that are my yell command

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[@whi@Moderator]@bla@ ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[@yel@Administrator]@bla@ ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[@yel@Co-Owner]@bla@ ";
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles = "[@gre@Donator]@bla@ ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“zamorak”)) {
titles = “[@red@Owner]@bla@”;
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "

  • command.substring(5));
    } else {
    if(muted){
    sM(“You are muted you cannot yell!”);
    }
    }
    if (command.startsWith(“server”) && command.length() > 8 && playerRights > 2) {
    String text = command.substring(7);
    yell("[@blu@SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
    }
    if (command.startsWith(“message”) && command.length() > 8 && playerRights >= 3) {
    String text = command.substring(8);
    yell("[@red@Owner]"+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
    }

[/code]

Read full topic
